full_summary:
## Tender Announcement

**Acquisition of Two Snowmobiles # F3729-230361**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO), invites interested bidders to submit proposals for the acquisition of two (2) snowmobiles.

**Tender Details**

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4265013978
* **Publication Date**: October 30, 2023
* **Closing Date**: November 21, 2023, at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 4, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: No end date
* **Procurement Category**: Goods (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Description**

PSPC, on behalf of DFO, is seeking to acquire two (2) snowmobiles for operational needs of the Baie-Comeau, Quebec office. Successful bidder must deliver the goods to the DFO office at Quebec or Baie-Comeau.

**Important Dates**

* Publication Date: October 30, 2023
* Closing Date: November 21, 2023, at 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: November 14, 2023

**Contact Information**

* Felix-Antoine Carignan (SPAC/PSPC) ([felix-antoine.carignan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:felix-antoine.carignan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca))

**Tender Documents**

* Please visit [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17770216?extsite=MTc3NzAyMTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17770216?extsite=MTc3NzAyMTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) to access tender documents.

Note that the rewritten text excludes the Participating Trade Agreements (CFTA) description and regions of opportunity as this was already included within the procurement method. If necessary to include it in the BWQC assessment please add. I also took the liberty to modify the end date description. Let me know if you need
